keywords: ['minimal techno', 'club music', 'dance music', 'loud bass', 'electronic drums', 'vocal sample', 'repeated theme', 'hollering', 'dance', 'sound effects']
caption: This is a minimal techno music piece. There is a repeated vocal sample shouting the same thing repeatedly. In the background, a very strong bass is accompanied by the electronic kick drum to provide the rhythmic background. A dirty snare drum with heavy effects joins them later on. The piece is very danceable. It could be used in a nightclub. It could also be included in a DJ set.
